Home / Review / J-Rocc Vs J-Man
R&B・ファンク

J-Rocc Vs J-Man

J-Rocc Vs J-man

02 Jun 2010

J.Roccと、UKのレーベル「Jazzman」のコラボレーションとなるミックス作品。Jazzmanの持つカタログの中からレアな音源を次から次へとミックスしていくファンキーかるソウルフルな作品。

SongList
  1. The Credo / Mary Lou Williams
  2. Shady Blues / Lee Mason
  3. 90% Of Me Is You / Vanessa Kendrick
  4. Daydreamin' / Bill Swift Trio
  5. Devil's Anvil / Eddie Warner
  6. Hot Funky & Sweaty / Soul Lifters
  7. Brasilian Beat / Los Brasilos
  8. Milk Break / J-Rocc
  9. Baby Don't Cry / Soul Pleasers
  10. Baby Don't Cry / The Third Guitar
  11. Do Right Man / Little Beaver/Sam Baker
  12. Mixed Drums / Andy Loore
  13. Neveen / Salah Ragab
  14. Cacumen / George Guzman
  15. Soana / Noro Morales
  16. Welcome To The Party / Har-You Percussion Group
  17. Tema De Soninha / Irp-3
  18. Future II / Personations & Organisation
  19. Darkness / Gamith
  20. It Was A Very Good Year / Della Reese
  21. Just Take Your Time / Innersouls
  22. Break / J-Rocc
  23. Funkier Than A Mosquito's Tweeter / Nina Simone
  24. Baltimore Oriole / Lorez Alexandria
  25. Creation Of Music / Primitive
  26. It Ain't Fair But It's Fun / The Fabulous Originals
  27. What Goes Around / Arthur Monday
  28. Black Out / Wess & The Airedales
  29. The Road /Communicators Band
  30. Can't Keep From Crying / Diedre Wilson Tabac
